Description.p: FedEx Global Brand Management was in need of a better way to access, edit and store their creative assets (logos, icons, images). The project deliverable was to create a better user interface for uploading, editing and sharing assets. This project was a full lifecycle project using Rally and Agile Methods and developed using AngularJS and MarkLogic.

The Stelter Company provides comprehensive gift planning solutions to not-for-profit organizations by creating websites that engage a donor through the many charitable options available today. Stelter provides 1,300 websites across the country. Through the years, the CMS they were using became obsolete, the project deliverable was to use a new CMS to create template webpages so they can build sites faster, with better functionality and flexibility, and re-build all 1300 sites using the new CMS.
This project was a full lifecycle project using Rally and Agile Methods and developed using Ingeniux CMS.

Motorola Solutions provides data and telecommunication equipment. Working with teams from London, India and the United States, we updated the administration of the site and the design of the site, so Motorola could edit and maintain the website faster and easier. This project used Rally and Agile Methods and developed using Vignette - Open Text.

The RanchBook is an on-line social network for ranchers, outdoor enthusiasts and outfitters to connect with each other. Members can upload images, post status, vote on images, upload documents, create blogs, send out announcements and create calendar events. Other features included notifications via text and email, GPS for ranches and privacy features. The user interface built supported both desktop and mobile views. This project was a full life cycle project using Rally and Agile Methods and developed using Cartella by Ingeniux.
